# Unigram
# orth
U00:%x[-2,0]
U01:%x[-1,0]
U02:%x[0,0]
U03:%x[1,0]
U04:%x[2,0]

# class
U10:%x[-2,1]
U11:%x[-1,1]
U12:%x[0,1]
U13:%x[1,1]
U14:%x[2,1]

# cas
U20:%x[-2,2]
U21:%x[-1,2]
U22:%x[0,2]
U23:%x[1,2]
U24:%x[2,2]

# gnd
U30:%x[-2,3]
U31:%x[-1,3]
U32:%x[0,3]
U33:%x[1,3]
U34:%x[2,3]

# nmb
U40:%x[-2,4]
U41:%x[-1,4]
U42:%x[0,4]
U43:%x[1,4]
U44:%x[2,4]

# regex feats
#U60:%x[-1,7]/%x[-1,8]
U61:%x[0,7]/%x[0,8]
#U62:%x[1,7]/%x[1,8]

# Bigram
B
